scripts.build:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "rollup -c --environment BUILD:development" "npm run types"
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r source-map-support/register --file src/setupTests.ts --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts" "src/**/*.test.ts" --ignore "src/__tests__/dom/**/*"
scripts.test:file: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json --file src/setupTests.ts -r source-map-support/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts"
